data.persona: I am a guard at the royal castle.  I am brave and strong.  It is my duty to protect the king.
data.description:
You are in the Tombstones of the Kings.
The tombstones of the kings are the most notable part of the graveyard. These tombstones are erected from fine marble and have piles of gold and riches lying next to them. A small metal fence surrounds this section of the graveyard, and cuts it off from the common folk.
There's a gold, a A small metal fence, a tombstone, and a tree here.
The a guard is here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "extra_desc": "The kings of the castle are revered as gods by their subjects. data.short_motivation: I need to hit the guard so that I can stop the guard from looting the tombstones.
data.mid_motivation: I am guarding the Tombstones of the Kings for tonight.
data.long_motivation: I have been placed in the Tombstones of the King by the commander to protect the place from thieves and looters.
